com.megatome.j2d.support

Class DocSetSupport

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.megatome.j2d.support.DocSetSupport

  • public class DocSetSupport
extends java.lang.Object
    Utility class for operations on the docset.

      • createDocSetStructure

        public static void createDocSetStructure(java.lang.String docsetDir)
                                  throws BuilderException
        Create the docset package. Will delete an existing docset if one already exists at the specified location.
        Parameters:
        docsetDir - Location of the docset to create
        Throws:
        BuilderException

      • copyIconFile

        public static void copyIconFile(java.io.File iconFile,
                                java.lang.String docsetDir)
                         throws BuilderException
        Copy an icon file to the docset. If the file path is not specified, no error happens.
        Parameters:
        iconFile - File to copy as the docset icon.
        docsetDir - Directory of the docset
        Throws:
        BuilderException

        public static void createPList(java.lang.String bundleIdentifier,
                               java.lang.String displayName,
                               java.lang.String keyword,
                               java.lang.String indexFile,
                               java.lang.String docsetDir)
                        throws BuilderException
        Create the plist file in the docset.
        Parameters:
        bundleIdentifier - Bundle identifier of the docset
        displayName - Name used to display the docset in Dash
        keyword - Keyword used for the docset in Dash
        indexFile - The file to be used as the docset index
        docsetDir - Directory of the docset
        Throws:
        BuilderException
